rows.label: tlk70000047_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The capital's in such a state now
I worry that things'll only get
worse for her from here on out.

rows.label: tlk70000047_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh divine father of Acedia...
Deliver us from evil! At least
deliver my little Freja from evil..

rows.label: tlk70000047_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Look at me, praying like a foolish
fishwife. That won't help Freja.

rows.label: tlk70000047_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Don't worry about us. Your energy is
better spent helping the injured or
assisting with rebuilding efforts.
